content: I am glad you added the last little section. The resistance is not just from the designers with a title. The resistance is also from those those without the title of “designer”, that believe that their world is locked into and defined by their own title. Like that CEO, they don’t yet even realize that design is not just the room down the hall. It is for that reason that I think it is great that people like Daniel Burka and Jarod Spool continue to speak out on this topic. What is obvious to some is so far from obvious to others.
